1453610.name: Ambient Channels: Desolate Space - Mining Tunnels
1453610.description:
In the 'Desolate Space' series, humans have left behind space facilities and locations it can no longer inhabit. In the 'Mining Tunnels' episode, you'll find a space mining site which can no longer be inhabited by humans because it's been overran by toxic spiders.

*This episode is currently ambiance only and does not include a hidden objects game.*
1453610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
